data.text:
@carlosradioguy Chuffin Nora C🤦 Let G-Man know that Fat Scottie is sending some heavyweight support his way👊👊👊

Hope you, C & M are are well👍
@carlosradioguy Oh I’m jealous of the railway but so sorry to hear this Carlos. I hope he gets a better soon!!

@carlosradioguy Hi Carl, how’s master George feeling today? Hope he’s feeling better for Daddy time - I don’t know if he likes the Underground but there’s lots of great videos about it on You Tube and Yesterday channel. All good here thank you, my birthday on Sunday so got the weekend off X
@carlosradioguy Wishing him a speedy recovery. I hope you’re beginning to feel better?

@carlosradioguy Oh no! Sorry to hear that. I think we’ve been really lucky. My 10 year old has been around it a lot at school, then her sister, and yet still hasn’t had it. Starting to think she’s immune. I did think you sounded a bit different the other week but just thought you had a cold. x

@carlosradioguy Worst thing in the World seeing your kids poorly and not being able to do much to help, apart from lots of cuddles, lots of fluids, and lots of fresh air weather permitting. All good here thank you x
@carlosradioguy Aww bless him, when he's better you can all have a lovely relaxing time at the beach x
@carlosradioguy I hope it’s not too long before he is back on his feet - but still wants the hugs 😊. And thank you for your kind wishes and great tunes, as always xx
